name: DiabeticMacularEdema
title: Diabetic Macular Edema
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of diabetic macular edema.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of diabetic macular edema or diabetic retinopathy with macular edema.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
